main event: A dark object approximately 30 feet in diameter was observed in the night sky over Santa Monica, California on 7 August 1952.
interesting points: The object was seen moving in an erratic, zigzag pattern,The object accelerated and disappeared from view,There were no other witnesses to the sighting,The sighting was reported to Project Blue Book,The weather was partly cloudy at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: dark object approximately 30 feet in diameter
